text: yaad karo jab hamane farishton se kaha, "aadam ko sajada karo." to ibalees ke siva sabane sajada kiya. vah jinnon mein se tha. to usane apane rab ke aadesh ka ullanghan kiya. ab kya tum mujhase itar use aur usakee santaan ko sanrakshak mitr banaate ho? haalaanki ve tumhaare shatru hai. kya hee bura vikalp hai, jo zaalimon ke haath aaya
